title: Java Full Stack Developer
description: Build microservices with Spring Boot, front-end with React 18, deploy on AWS (ECS/Lambda). 7+ years preferred.

title: AWS Cloud Engineer
description: Design serverless on AWS, IaC with Terraform, EKS cluster administration. Good with networking (VPC, ALB).

title: React Developer
description: Modern React (hooks, Suspense), build accessible UIs. Experience with design systems and Storybook a plus.

title: Data Engineer (Kafka/Snowflake)
description: Streaming pipelines with Kafka, ETL orchestration, Snowflake performance tuning, Airflow experience preferred.

title: SRE / DevOps Engineer
description: Operate K8s platforms, observability (Grafana, Prometheus), GitOps (Argo CD), optimize CI/CD with Jenkins.

title: Full Stack Node/Java Developer
description: Services in Node/Java, DynamoDB streams, API Gateway. Preferably experience with Step Functions.

title: Angular Frontend Engineer
description: Frontend development with Angular 15+, build component libraries, optimize performance with RxJS.

title: Python Data Scientist
description: Develop ML pipelines, train deep learning models, deploy on AWS Sagemaker. Strong in Python + data wrangling.
